1.0.name: wordpress/soometa
1.0.description: Soo Meta helps bloggers & journalists turn their stories into short movies. Users can pull any video, sound, picture or text from any source (web as well as the hard drive) and it allows editors to create a new story out of that material. It’s basically a very simple video editor, where you can organize your scenes in chapters. Each chapter has a timeline that can be divided into unlimited number of sections (cuts). It’s easy to fill up and modify each section by simply clicking or dragging the collected items.
